Description: Foot sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery kantharos; moulded pedestal foot in two degrees; concave on inside; glazed black on exterior and on underside; reserved between degrees of moulding and on resting surface; inscription cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 556)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1251)
